app_description: English to Spanish Spanish to English free translator Voice Translation Speak to translate. Speak anything you want to translate and get immediate translation. Voice translation is very helpful for travel around the world and easily communicate in any country Camera Translation: Translate any picture or from camera. Easily translate menus signs or paper documents Typing Translation: Type anything you want to translate from english to spanish and spanish to english You can also paste someone message and get instant translation Other features: Free Translation app learn how to speak translated words Listen Translated sentences or words Share translated words or sentences with friends smoothest user experience free offline dictionary Permission notice: Microphone for speech translation Camera for translating text via camera Photos for importing photos from your library 2 Type of subscription are available 3 per month Auto renewable subscription 45 per year Auto renewable subscription Privacy policy URL: https: correctspellingapp.wordpress.com 2021 05 27 privacy policies translator app Terms service URL: https: correctspellingapp.wordpress.com 2021 05 27 terms and services translator app
